original_text: And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked, and have cut off all thine enemies from before thee, and have made thee a name like the name of the great men that are in the earth.
korean_text: 네가 어디로 가든지 내가 너와 함께 있어 네 모든 대적을 네 앞에서 멸하였은즉 세상에서 존귀한 자들의 이름 같은 이름을 네게 만들어 주리라

sentences.original_text: And I have been with thee
and have cut off all thine enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 네 모든 대적을 끊었으며

sentences.original_text: and have made thee a name
like the name of the great men
